alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued May 08 at 9:00PM CDT until May 08 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 202 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS BOURBON CHEROKEE CRAWFORD IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 25 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSOURI DENT HOWELL OREGON SHANNON TEXAS IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY BARTON CEDAR CHRISTIAN DADE DALLAS DOUGLAS GREENE JASPER LACLEDE LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON OZARK POLK STONE TANEY WEBSTER WRIGHT IN WEST CENTRAL MISSOURI VERNON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALTON, ANDERSON, ARNICA, AURORA, AVA, BANGERT, BAXTER SPRINGS, BENDAVIS, BIRCH TREE, BOLIVAR, BRANSON, BUFFALO, CAPLINGER MILLS, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CEDAR SPRINGS, CHARITY, CHICOPEE, CHRISTIAN CENTER, COLUMBUS, COUCH, CRANE, DARIEN, DAWSON, DOGWOOD, DUNCAN, EDGEWATER BEACH, EL DORADO SPRINGS, ELSEY, FILLEY, FOOSE, FORSYTH, FORT SCOTT, GLADDEN, GOODHOPE, GOODMAN, GRAFF, GREENFIELD, GREER, HOLLISTER, HOWES, HUGGINS, INDIAN POINT, JADWIN, JOPLIN, KENOMA, KIMBERLING CITY, KIRBYVILLE, LAKE SPRING, LAMAR, LEBANON, LOCKWOOD, LONE OAK, LOWELL, LYNCHBURG, MADRY, MANSFIELD, MARCH, MARIONVILLE, MARSHFIELD, MEINERT, MONETT, MONTIER, MOUNT VERNON, MOUNTAIN GROVE, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NEVADA, NIXA, NOEL, NORTHVIEW, OLIVE, OZARK, OZARK BEACH, PAWNEE STATION, PINEVILLE, PITTSBURG, PLAD, PLATO, POMONA, POTTERSVILLE, POWERSITE, RIVERTON, ROBY, ROCKY COMFORT, ROGERSVILLE, ROME, SALEM, SELMORE, SEYMOUR, SHERWIN, SILOAM SPRINGS, SILVER DOLLAR CITY, SOUTH FORK, SOUTH WEST CITY, SPRINGFIELD, SQUIRES, STIPPVILLE, STOCKTON, TERESITA, THAYER, THOMASVILLE, VANZANT, WASOLA, WEST PLAINS, WHITE CHURCH, WILDERNESS, WINDYVILLE, AND WINONA.
